template: We have an image with these objects: ['tennis racket', 'tennis player', 'tennis court', 'shorts', 'sneakers', 'headband', 't-shirt', 'tennis ball', 'net', 'tennis ball in motion', 'tennis ball in hand', 'tennis ball on ground', 'tennis ball in air', 'tennis ball in net', 'tennis ball in racket', 'tennis ball in hand', 'tennis ball in shorts', 'tennis ball in sneakers', 'tennis ball in headband']. Generate a caption based only on these objects.
